content: Caesarâ€™s audacity was the beginning of a very distinguished military and political career. In time, like Alexander the Great and Napoleon Bonapart, he became one of the most famous figures in world history.
translations: ita:L'audacia di Cesare fu l'inizio di una carriera militare e politica molto distinta. Con il tempo, come Alessandro Magno
